A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy thought it would be a good idea to completely disrespect the legacy of Luke Skywalker in the name of social justice. Then they had the gall to try and discredit the fans negative reviews by claiming a small group of fanboys used bots to drive down the approval rating. A first year filmmaking student could've made this movie successful among the fan base. Not only is The Last Jedi the worst Star Wars movie ever made\, it seriously jeopardizes the future of the franchise.
